attributes.name: Developer Weapons
attributes.description: SALVAGE: Give a bunch of weapons for testing.
attributes.parsed_description: SALVAGE: Give a bunch of weapons for testing.

attributes.name: Devil's Honey
attributes.description: Honey taken from Devil's Quarry. They say a spoonful satisfies the body and sunders the soul.
attributes.parsed_description: Honey taken from Devil's Quarry. They say a spoonful satisfies the body and sunders the soul.

attributes.name: Diamond
attributes.description: Used in Jewelcrafting, but must be cut and polished at a Stonecutting Station first.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in Jewelcrafting, but must be cut and polished at a Stonecutting Station first.

attributes.name: Dill
attributes.description: Dill sprigs, used to add an aromatic, pungent note to cuisine.
attributes.parsed_description: Dill sprigs, used to add an aromatic, pungent note to cuisine.

attributes.name: Distilled Orichalcum Ingot
attributes.description: Only the finest metal will do for this blade.
attributes.parsed_description: Only the finest metal will do for this blade.

attributes.name: Divine Wrappings
attributes.description: It is impossible to say just how old they are, and yet they show no signs of wear.
attributes.parsed_description: It is impossible to say just how old they are, and yet they show no signs of wear.

attributes.name: Divining Stones
attributes.description: They look similar to lithomancy stones, but no one is certain of their real use.
attributes.parsed_description: They look similar to lithomancy stones, but no one is certain of their real use.

attributes.name: Divinity Ward
attributes.description: Said to protect the wearer from certain death. Perhaps it will fare better in your hands.
attributes.parsed_description: Said to protect the wearer from certain death. Perhaps it will fare better in your hands.

attributes.name: Double-Braced Bellows
attributes.description: A bellows for a smelter or forge.

attributes.name: Draco Sky Disk
attributes.description: A flat clay disk with a rendering of the night sky.

attributes.name: Dragon Fish Jaw
